amendment.description: Amendment prohibits the use of any funds appropriated in the bill from being used to increase the FDA's administrative office staff above the levels for fiscal year 1995.
amendment.purpose: An amendment, printed as amendment No. 41 in the Congressional Record of July 17, 1995, to prohibit the use of any funds appropriated in the bill from being used to increase the FDA's administrative office staff above the levels for FY 1995.

vote.text: On agreeing to the McIntosh amendment (A024) Agreed to by voice vote.
